attributes.action: seize and crush vehicles from which litter has been thrown from and to engage prisoners in cleaning litter from our roadsides and openspaces.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are faced with an increasing minority of selfish people who think it is acceptable to throw litter from their vehicles. With the rat population at record levels surely it is time to get really tough on those who litter our roads and openspaces. Furthermore, why not give offenders the option to work outside and assist local authorities in litter clearing for a reduction in sentence? This would really help to clean up our ever increasingly grotty country.
